segments.text: I notice the girl is being so cooperative, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not trying to climb up herself, which is good.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really taking a risk, standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried that he might fall and hurt himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just so focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she's even aware of how much water is on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is just overflowing, and she doesn't seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit annoyed that she's not paying attention to the children.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and calm.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a completely different world out there compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the children can get their cookies without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR
